question: How do I create an account?
answer: To create an account, click on the 'Register' button on the login page. Enter your personal information, set a password, and submit the form. You registration will be completed.

question: How do I list my service on the platform?
answer: After creating an account, navigate to 'Add Service' in your dashboard. Fill out the service details, including the service name, description, price, and an image. Submit the information, and your service will be visible on the platform.

question: How can I book a service?
answer: To book a service, browse the list of available services. Select the service you're interested in, then click 'Book Now.' Follow the prompts to complete the booking, including payment if required.

question: Can I update or delete my service after listing it?
answer: Yes, you can update or delete your service from your account dashboard. Go to 'Manage Services,' Press 'Edit' button on the service you want to update or delete, and choose the appropriate action.

question: What payment methods are accepted?
answer: We do accept online payment mehtod right now. We are currently working on this procedure. During the booking process, service provider will decide how to make payment.

question: How can I contact customer support?
answer: If you need assistance, you can contact our support team through the 'Contact Us' page. You can also email us at support@eventfulsoirees.com or call our customer service number.

question: What types of services are available on the platform?
answer: We offer a wide range of services for events, including event planning, catering, photography, live music, and more. You can explore the available services on our homepage, or navigate to 'Services' or use the search feature to find specific services.

question: Is my personal information secure on the platform?
answer: Yes, we take data security seriously. We use encryption and secure protocols to protect your personal information. Please refer to our privacy policy for more details on data protection and usage.
